roleset.name: affix a signature
roleset.note: SIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sign' based on big corpus. Comparison with 'write'. Member of VNcls image_impression-25.1. (from sign.01-v)
SIGNING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from signing.01-n)

example.name: sign-v: historical
example.text: John's great-uncle Fred signed the Declaration of Independence--unfortunately, in 1924.

example.name: sign-v: with explicit signature
example.text: One writer signed his letter as "Red blooded, balanced male".

roleset.name: enter into an agreement
roleset.note: SIGN-V NOTES: These two senses would be easy to merge, since the assumption is that anyagreement is based upon a signature on a piece of paper. Nominal 'signing' based on BOLT-7. VN class hire-13.5.3, but this only fits certain instances listed under this roleset. (from sign.02-v)
SIGNING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from signing.02-n)

example.name: sign-v: agreement
example.text: First Constitution has signed a merger agreement with WFRR LP and GHKM Corp.
example.arg: with WFRR LP and GHKM Corp.

example.name: sign-v: no co-signer
example.text: An ultimatum: *trace* either sign new long-term commitments to buy future episodes, or don't.
example.arg: new long-term commitments to buy future episodes

example.name: sign-v: sign to
example.text: John was signed to the Mudville Giants.

example.name: signing-n
example.text: When Ma Ying - jeou resumed its " reign " four years ago , he worked actively to make up for the time squandered by the DPP , and the signing of the Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement -LRB- ECFA -RRB- was the biggest highlight .
example.arg: of the Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement -LRB- ECFA -RRB-

roleset.name: sign up: enroll, enter
roleset.note: SIGN_UP-V NOTES: Member of VNcls hire-13.5.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sign.03-v)
SIGNING_UP-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from signing.03-n)

example.name: sign_up-v: non-agentive
example.text: Only four securtities firms have signed up with the Bog Board to buy and sellESPs as market makers.
example.arg: to buy and sell ESPs as market makers

example.name: sign_up-v: agentive
example.text: Whittle said its field staff signed up the 500 schools in 238 school districts.

roleset.name: sign on: become associated with
roleset.note: SIGN_ON-V NOTES: Member of Vncls hire-13.5.3, but this roleset is incompatible with the VN structure, where agent is boss and signed-on is employee, and it's opposite here. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sign.04-v)
SIGNING_ON-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from signing.04-n)

example.name: sign_on-v: unnamed arg1
example.text: Mr. Lorenzo, 49 years old, is reclaiming the job that was his before Mr. Corr signed on.

example.name: sign_on-v: with arg1
example.text: If it finds one of those passwords, Mr. Alexander said, the worm will do such things as change users' passwords to a series of random numbers, preventing them-1 from [*]-1 signing on to the network.

roleset.name: sign_off: give stamp of approval
roleset.note: SIGN_OFF-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from sign.05-v)
SIGNING_OFF-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from signing.05-n)

role.descr: entity being given stamp of approval
for what, second part of arg1

example.name: sign_off-v: all args
example.text: A new ' govt backed ' review has concluded that GP's should be stripped of the power *PRO* to sign patients off on long term sick .

example.name: sign_off-v: Args 0, 1
example.text: The publisher signed off on the book and sent it to be printed.

roleset.name: check in
roleset.note: SIGN_IN-V NOTES: Based on Bolt SMS data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from sign.06-v)
SIGNING_IN-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from signing.06-n)

example.name: sign_in-v: parental arg 0
example.text: John signed his daughter in at day care before rushing of to work.

example.name: sign_in-v: guard at the door as arg 0
example.text: Dori will sign you in

roleset.name: show, cause to see, communicate by signaling, message
roleset.note: SIGNAL-V NOTES: Comparison to 'show'. Member of VNcls instr_communication-37.4. (from signal.01-v)
SIGN-N NOTES: Based on sentences in New Testiment. No comparison. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from sign.01-n)
SIGNAL-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on signal-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls instr_communication-37.4. (from signal.01-n)

roles.note: arg3 added based on presence in corpus. (from signal.01-n)

role.descr: subject-matter of the signals (what they relate to)

example.name: signal-v: no seer, nominal thing seen
example.text: I would be very surprised if his departure signals any change in strategy or change in profit expectations.''
example.arg: any change in strategy or change in profit expectations

example.name: signal-v: with seer, sentential thing seen
example.text: Moreover, some analysts said they expect a foreign paper company with deeper pockets than Georgia-Pacific to end up acquiring Nekoosa, *trace* signaling to the rest of the industry that hostile bids are unproductive.
example.arg: to the rest of the industry

example.name: signal-v: different kind of seer
example.text: Mr. Simmons said the results signal a turnaround for the maker of wire and wire products, which has struggled to remain competitive in the face of lower-priced, imported steel.
example.arg: for the maker of wire and wire products, which has struggled to remain competitive in the face of lower-priced, imported steel

example.name: sign-n: args 0 and 2
example.text: His signs to the people

example.name: signal-n: autogen1
example.text: their signal to the world that now is the time to get tough onprices
example.arg: that now is the time to get tough on prices

example.name: signal-n: arg3
example.text: It has sent mixed signals about its willingness to take part in the exchange - rate mechanism of the European Monetary System
example.arg: about its willingness to take part in the exchange-rate mechanism of the European Monetary System
